parameters.name: Linked
parameters.description: True to set a drawing view to the specified BOM or weldment cut-list table, false to not

parameters.name: Name
parameters.description: Name of the BOM or weldment cut-list table to which to link this drawing view

title: IView.SetKeepLinkedToBOM
description: Sets whether this drawing view is linked to the specified BOM or weldment cut-list table.
signature:
System.Boolean SetKeepLinkedToBOM( 
   System.Boolean
Linked
,
   System.String
Name
)

parameters.name: Linked
parameters.description: True to set a drawing view to the specified BOM or weldment cut-list table, false to not

parameters.name: Name
parameters.description: Name of the BOM or weldment cut-list table to which to link this drawing view

returns: True if the BOM or weldment cut-list table is linked to this drawing view, false if not
remarks: This method returns false if the string specified for Name does not correspond to the name of a BOM or weldment cut-list table feature created for the model in this drawing view.
